mapper.select: select group_concat(r.role_name) as sendMode from secret_key as sk left join app_role as ar on ar.app_id=sk.app_id and ar.is_deleted=0 left join sendMode as r on r.id=ar.role_id and r.flag=0 where sk.app_key=#{appKey} and sk.flag=0
select app_secret from app where id=#{appId} and is_deleted=0
select app_key, app_secret, status from app where id=#{appId}
